title: Spy

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- On night one, see everybody’s roles.
- You may register as good to abilities, even while dead.
- You do not have access to mafia night meetings.
- You are informed of every role change.
- At the start of the game, the public message “The town feels as though they’re being spied on” will be displayed.

desc:
Post 3662
*Any brewmaster worth their liquor, knows no concoction pours trouble quicker, than one where spies seem double*
